posts.post_content:
Hi everyone. Here is the short list of the last 18 true common bits of the Monster that I need. I need a few others that are listed as commons but we all know that they aren't.:D. Anyway, I am looking for common backs and my first choice would be "raw". PSA3 or SGC40 would work also and should be used as  a benchmark for the raw as well. A LITTLE shy of the mark MIGHT be do-able but anything better will squeeze the budget.:) Thanks in advance to any respondents. PM me and I am sure we could work something out.....Mike
Here are the 18 stragglers. 

1. Ed Abbaticchio (Blue Sleeves) GOT 'EM....eBay
45. Bill Bradley (Portrait)GOT 'EM....THANKS MICHAEL
49. Roy Brashear  GOT 'EM....eBay
132. Wild Bill Donovan (Throwing) GOT 'EM....THANKS BRUCE
133. Red Dooin GOT 'EM....THANKS ZACH
205. Buck Herzog (New York)GOT 'EM....THANKS Jason
249b. Red Kleinow (New York) (Catching) GOT 'EM....THANKS ROB
281. Paddy Livingstone (Livingston) GOT 'EM....THANKS BRUCE
320. George McQuillan (With Bat) GOT 'EM....THANKS ZACH
324. Chief Meyers GOT 'EM....THANKS BILL
333. Herbie Moran (Providence)GOT 'EM....THANKS MICHAEL
352. Rebel Oakes GOT 'EM....eBay
365. Orval Overall (Portrait)GOT 'EM....eBay
384. Ollie Pickering GOT 'EM....THANKS FRANK
402. Claude Ritchey GOT 'EM....THANKS ROB
431. Hunky Shaw (Providence) GOT 'EM....THANKS KEITH
456. George Stovall (Batting)GOT 'EM....eBay
484. Heinie Wagner (Bat On Left Shoulder) GOT 'EM....THANKS MARK

there was a guy at the national that had almost all of these in a psa 5.

he is not online any where, ebay or website.

kevin
A Bump to see what's what................

One last bump....I still need 8 of these commons. PM me if you can help....Thanks...Mike

Looking for the last two on the list, Bradley (Portrait) and Brashear.
